StringProperty.Name: Options
StringProperty.Description: Options to pass to the code generator.

StringProperty.Name: ClientBaseClass
StringProperty.Description: The client base class (empty for no base class).

StringProperty.Name: ConfigurationClass
StringProperty.Description: The configuration class. The setting ClientBaseClass must be set. (empty for no configuration class).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateClientClasses
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether generate client classes.

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateClientInterfaces
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether generate interfaces for the client classes.

StringProperty.Name: ClientBaseInterface
StringProperty.Description: Base interface for client interfaces (empty for no client base interface).

BoolProperty.Name: InjectHttpClient
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether an HttpClient instance is injected (default: true).

BoolProperty.Name: DisposeHttpClient
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to dispose the HttpClient (injected HttpClient is never disposed).

StringListProperty.Name: ProtectedMethods
StringListProperty.Description: List of methods with a protected access modifier ('classname.methodname').

StringProperty.Name: ExceptionClass
StringProperty.Description: The exception class (default 'SwaggerException', may use '{controller}' placeholder).

BoolProperty.Name: WrapDtoExceptions
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether DTO exceptions are wrapped in a SwaggerException instance (default: true).

BoolProperty.Name: UseHttpClientCreationMethod
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to call CreateHttpClientAsync on the base class to create a new HttpClient.

StringProperty.Name: HttpClientType
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the HttpClient type. By default the 'System.Net.Http.HttpClient' is used.

BoolProperty.Name: UseHttpRequestMessageCreationMethod
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to call CreateHttpRequestMessageAsync on the base class to create a new HttpRequestMethod.

BoolProperty.Name: UseBaseUrl
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to use and expose the base URL (default: true).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateBaseUrlProperty
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to generate the BaseUrl property, must be defined on the base class otherwise (default: true).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateSyncMethods
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to generate synchronous methods (not recommended, default: false).

BoolProperty.Name: GeneratePrepareRequestAndProcessResponseAsAsyncMethods
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to generate PrepareRequest and ProcessResponse methods as asynchronous methods (if true, both must be defined in the base class or in the partial class, default: false).

BoolProperty.Name: ExposeJsonSerializerSettings
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to expose the JsonSerializerSettings property (default: false).

StringProperty.Name: ClientClassAccessModifier
StringProperty.Description: The client class access modifier (default: public).

StringProperty.Name: TypeAccessModifier
StringProperty.Description: The DTO class/enum access modifier (default: public).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateContractsOutput
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to generate contracts output (interface and models in a separate file set with the ContractsOutput parameter).

StringProperty.Name: ContractsNamespace
StringProperty.Description: The contracts .NET namespace.

StringProperty.Name: ContractsOutput
StringProperty.Description: The contracts output file path (optional, if no path is set then a single file with the implementation and contracts is generated).

StringProperty.Name: ParameterDateTimeFormat
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the format for DateTime type method parameters (default: s).

StringProperty.Name: ParameterDateFormat
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the format for Date type method parameters (default: yyyy-MM-dd).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateUpdateJsonSerializerSettingsMethod
BoolProperty.Description: Generate the UpdateJsonSerializerSettings method (must be implemented in the base class otherwise, default: true).

BoolProperty.Name: UseRequestAndResponseSerializationSettings
BoolProperty.Description: Generate different request and response serialization settings (default: false).

BoolProperty.Name: SerializeTypeInformation
BoolProperty.Description: Serialize the type information in a $type property (not recommended, also sets TypeNameHandling = Auto, default: true).

StringProperty.Name: QueryNullValue
StringProperty.Description: The null value used for query parameters which are null (default: '').

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateOptionalParameters
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to reorder parameters (required first, optional at the end) and generate optional parameters (default: false).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateJsonMethods
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to render ToJson() and FromJson() methods for DTOs (default: true).

BoolProperty.Name: EnforceFlagEnums
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether enums should be always generated as bit flags (default: false).

StringProperty.Name: ParameterArrayType
StringProperty.Description: The generic array .NET type of operation parameters (default: 'IEnumerable').

StringProperty.Name: ParameterDictionaryType
StringProperty.Description: The generic dictionary .NET type of operation parameters (default: 'IDictionary').

StringProperty.Name: ResponseArrayType
StringProperty.Description: The generic array .NET type of operation responses (default: 'ICollection').

StringProperty.Name: ResponseDictionaryType
StringProperty.Description: The generic dictionary .NET type of operation responses (default: 'IDictionary').

BoolProperty.Name: WrapResponses
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to wrap success responses to allow full response access.

StringListProperty.Name: WrapResponseMethods
StringListProperty.Description: List of methods where responses are wrapped ('ControllerName.MethodName', WrapResponses must be true).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateResponseClasses
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to generate response classes (default: true).

StringProperty.Name: ResponseClass
StringProperty.Description: The response class (default 'SwaggerResponse', may use '{controller}' placeholder).

BoolProperty.Name: RequiredPropertiesMustBeDefined
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether a required property must be defined in JSON (sets Required.Always when the property is required).

StringProperty.Name: DateType
StringProperty.Description: The date .NET type (default: 'DateTimeOffset').

StringListProperty.Name: JsonConverters
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the custom Json.NET converter types (optional, comma separated).

StringProperty.Name: AnyType
StringProperty.Description: The any .NET type (default: 'object').

StringProperty.Name: DateTimeType
StringProperty.Description: The date time .NET type (default: 'DateTimeOffset').

StringProperty.Name: TimeType
StringProperty.Description: The time .NET type (default: 'TimeSpan').

StringProperty.Name: TimeSpanType
StringProperty.Description: The time span .NET type (default: 'TimeSpan').

StringProperty.Name: ArrayType
StringProperty.Description: The generic array .NET type (default: 'ICollection').

StringProperty.Name: ArrayInstanceType
StringProperty.Description: The generic array .NET instance type (default: empty = ArrayType).

StringProperty.Name: DictionaryType
StringProperty.Description: The generic dictionary .NET type (default: 'IDictionary').

StringProperty.Name: DictionaryInstanceType
StringProperty.Description: The generic dictionary .NET instance type (default: empty = DictionaryType).

StringProperty.Name: ArrayBaseType
StringProperty.Description: The generic array .NET type (default: 'Collection').

StringProperty.Name: DictionaryBaseType
StringProperty.Description: The generic dictionary .NET type (default: 'Dictionary').

EnumProperty.Name: JsonLibrary
EnumProperty.Description: The CSharp JSON library, 'NewtonsoftJson' or 'SystemTextJson' (default: 'NewtonsoftJson', 'SystemTextJson' is experimental).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateDefaultValues
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to generate default values for properties (may generate CSharp 6 code, default: true).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateDataAnnotations
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to generate data annotation attributes on DTO classes (default: true).

StringListProperty.Name: ExcludedTypeNames
StringListProperty.Description: The excluded DTO type names (must be defined in an import or other namespace).

BoolProperty.Name: HandleReferences
BoolProperty.Description: Use preserve references handling (All) in the JSON serializer (default: false).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateImmutableArrayProperties
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to remove the setter for non-nullable array properties (default: false).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateImmutableDictionaryProperties
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to remove the setter for non-nullable dictionary properties (default: false).

StringProperty.Name: JsonSerializerSettingsTransformationMethod
StringProperty.Description: The name of a static method which is called to transform the JsonSerializerSettings used in the generated ToJson()/FromJson() methods (default: none).

BoolProperty.Name: InlineNamedArrays
BoolProperty.Description: Inline named arrays (default: false).

BoolProperty.Name: InlineNamedDictionaries
BoolProperty.Description: Inline named dictionaries (default: false).

BoolProperty.Name: InlineNamedTuples
BoolProperty.Description: Inline named tuples (default: true).

BoolProperty.Name: InlineNamedAny
BoolProperty.Description: Inline named any types (default: false).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateDtoTypes
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to generate DTO classes.

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateOptionalPropertiesAsNullable
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether optional schema properties (not required) are generated as nullable properties (default: false).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateNullableReferenceTypes
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether whether to generate Nullable Reference Type annotations (default: false).

StringProperty.Name: TemplateDirectory
StringProperty.Description: The Liquid template directory (experimental).

StringProperty.Name: TypeNameGenerator
StringProperty.Description: The custom ITypeNameGenerator implementation type in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

StringProperty.Name: PropertyNameGeneratorType
StringProperty.Description: The custom IPropertyNameGenerator implementation type in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

StringProperty.Name: EnumNameGeneratorType
StringProperty.Description: The custom IEnumNameGenerator implementation type in the form 'assemblyName:fullTypeName' or 'fullTypeName').

BoolProperty.Name: ChecksumCacheEnabled
BoolProperty.Description: Whether output generation can be skipped if source document checksum matches existing output (default: false).

StringProperty.Name: ServiceHost
StringProperty.Description: Overrides the service host of the web document (optional, use '.' to remove the hostname).

StringListProperty.Name: ServiceSchemes
StringListProperty.Description: Overrides the allowed schemes of the web service (optional, comma separated, 'http', 'https', 'ws', 'wss').

EnumProperty.Name: NewLineBehavior
EnumProperty.Description: The new line behavior (Auto (OS default), CRLF, LF).
